resolved.description: https://hg.mozilla.org/releases/mozilla-beta/rev/5ba0247433fe didn't make the beta builds. Mark as ship will fail. We just need to use the ship-it web UI (the old one) to mark the release as shipped. Kudos to Mihai for warning us.
